com.gratex.perconik.activity.ide.listeners

Class IdeProjectListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.AbstractRegistrable
      • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.Adapter
        • com.gratex.perconik.activity.ide.listeners.IdeListener
          • com.gratex.perconik.activity.ide.listeners.IdeProjectListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceChangeListener, org.eclipse.ui.ISelectionListener, FilteringListener<ResourceEventType>, Listener, ResourceListener, SelectionListener, Registrable

    public final class IdeProjectListener
extends IdeListener
implements ResourceListener, SelectionListener
    A listener of IDE project events. This listener handles desired events and eventually builds corresponding data transfer objects of type IdeProjectEventRequest and passes them to the UacaProxy to be transferred into the User Activity Central Application for further processing.

    Project operation types that this listener is interested in are determined by the IdeProjectEventType enumeration:

    • Add - a project is added into the workspace.
    • Close - an opened project is closed.
    • Open - a closed project is opened.
    • Refresh - a project is refreshed.
    • Remove - a project is removed from the workspace.
    • Rename - currently not supported.
    • Switch to - focus is changed from one project to another and editor selections (tabs and text) are supported. Note that structured selections in package explorer are not supported.

    Data available in an IdeProjectEventRequest:

    • See IdeListener for documentation of inherited data.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell
